title: Neat Eco-Friendly Surface Cleaner Refills - Mango & Fig Scent, Minimal Cleaning Solution for Home (6x 30ml Refills)
features: PLASTIC-FREE CONCENTRATED ANTI-BAC REFILLS - just add tap water for powerfuL cleaning without the plastic waste
ELIMINATES 99.9% OF BACTERIA with powerful plant-based ingredients
MANGO & FIG: Juicy mango meets sweet fig for a joyful tropical scent
DESIGNED TO BE USED WITH NEAT. ALUMINIUM SPRAY BOTTLES
VEGAN, NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS and MADE IN BRITAIN
INCLUDES: 6x Plastic-Free Concentrated Mulit- surface Anti-Bac Refills (6x Mango & Fig)
description: Say hello to our best-selling, Neat Eco Anti-Bac Multi-Surface Cleaner spray refills (x6). Packed full of powerfully plant-based ingredients that kill 99.9% of bacteria whilst cutting through tough grease and grime - it's the perfect all-rounder for everyday kitchen spills and messes. This eco-conscious pack ensures that you always have your favorite cleaning solution on hand, making it easy to maintain a spotless home. Our Natural Cleaning Products for Home are formualted to effectively combats grease and grime, leaving surfaces clean, sanitised, and streak-free. From countertops to stovetops, this Safe for Multi-Surface Use cleaner is perfect for every area of your home, making it a flexible and practical solution for busy families. This includes 6x 30 ml concentrated Mango & Fig Anti-Bac Multi-Surface Cleaner spray refills. One 30ml bottle makes 500ml of cleaning spray. Fragrance: Mango & Fig: A delightful fusion that marries the tropical sweetness of ripe mangoes with the sophisticated, earthy notes of figs creating a refreshing, slightly sweet aroma. Refill in three simple steps 1 Pour 470ml of water into your neat. bottle. 2 Add the 30ml refill, and secure the trigger spray. 3 Shake well, and you're good to go. Spray, leave for 5 minutes then wipe. Leave to dry. Use as often as needed. Suitable for wood, glass, stainless steel, tile, laminates, sealed stone, granite and marble. It's not suitable for unsealed stone, unsealed granite or unsealed marble, and some paint finishes. If in doubt, test in a discreet spot first.
